name: SCALE
description: Annotates and validates data for AI applications.
sampleDescriptions: Support the use of tagging, annotating, and processing data to leverage machine learning tools for use by the Department of Defense.
Educate Congress on the importance of data infrastructure to train, tag, annotate and develop better artificial intelligence algorithms.
Educate Congress on the importance of data infrastructure to train, tag, annotate and develop better artificial intelligence algorithms.

Educate Congress and the administration on the importance of data infrastructure to develop better artificial intelligence algorithms. Advocate for Artificial Intelligence programs in S. 4049 / H.R. 6
